scripts.prod:watch: npm run prod & onchange public/** -- npm run prod:build
scripts.prod:build: npm run prod:copy && npm run prod:minify
scripts.prod:copy: rm -rf prod && cp -r public prod && rm prod/gdc/css/style.css prod/gdc/js/{l10n.js,main.js}
scripts.prod:minify: npm run prod:minify:css && npm run prod:minify:js
scripts.prod:minify:js: uglifyjs public/gdc/js/main.js > prod/gdc/js/main.js && uglifyjs public/gdc/js/l10n.js > prod/gdc/js/l10n.js
